narrative.narrative: Bin Air is a German charter cargo and passenger airline. Its base is Munich. It flies charters throughout Europe. It was founded in 1996. It uses eleven Fairchild Swearingen Metroliners as of December 2015 and has the largest fleet of them in Europe. It has been seen at places like Dublin,Ireland and Manchester,England and domestic places like Cologne and Stuttgart as far as photos of their planes in operation.
